282230.name: Wing IDE 5 Demo
282230.description:
Wing IDE is an integrated development environment for the Python programming language. Wing's powerful editing, debugging, testing, code inspection, refactoring, search, and revision control features make programming in Python fast and easy.

Wing IDE works with Python 2.x and 3.x and can be used with Autodesk Maya, NUKE, Blender, Source Filmmaker, and any other modeling, rendering, and compositing software that uses Python as a scripting language.

Wing IDE also works with pygame, PyOpenGL, and other Python game libraries (see ).

The Non-Commercial Use license is for students and hobbyists. If you make money from your use of Wing IDE, please purchase the Commercial Use license.
282230.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语
